process_dataset.save_sensor_logger_dataset¶

process_dataset.save_sensor_logger_dataset(imu: DataFrame, magnetometer: DataFrame, barometer: DataFrame, gps: DataFrame, output_format: str = 'csv', output_folder: str = './') → None¶

Saves the processed sensor logger data. Data is saved to a folder.

Parameters:

  • imu (pandas.DataFrame) – IMU data.

  • magnetometer (pandas.DataFrame) – Magnetometer data.

  • barometer (pandas.DataFrame) – barometer data.

  • gps (pandas.DataFrame) – GPS data.

  • output_format (string) – file extension and format for output files. Optional.

Output_folder:

filepath and/or folder name for output. Optional.

Returns:

none
